author: morgand
msg: parser was inappropriately trapping throwables, hiding classpath problems,

author: jstrachan
msg: Added an example of using the file set and XSLT together in one Jelly script to try reproduce James Carlyle's bug.

author: jstrachan
msg: Fix to bug where using a script inside a loop wasn't correcty seeing new variables.
Ultimately it'd be great to unify the Jelly and BeanShell scopes properly so that there wasn't a need to copy variables into/out of scopes to boost performance a bit. Still at least it works now.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for File as an acceptable type of the xml and xslt parameters
